name: Ultimate Felt Food Pizza - 32 Piece - Stuffed Crust - Removable Toppings
description:
Who is ready to play pizza parlor? Place an order for this ultimate four slice pizza set with hand sewn stuffed crust and 28 removable toppings. It's great interactive fun for any pizza lover! Ready to ship.

Includes:
4 green pepper slices
4 pepperoni slices
4 ham slices
4 onion slices
4 pineapple
4 mushrooms 
4 black olives
4 slices of pizza base

Slice measures 3 1/2 by 4 1/4 inches--a size that fits well on most sized play dishes. Pizza measures nearly 7 inches in diameter. Pizza ships in its own pizza box, perfect for repeated play! 

Not intended for children under 3 or who are still mouthing their toys. Each item is crafted in a pet free, smoke free environment. No glue was used in the making of this product.

name: Felt Food Cookie Set - 6 Cookies with Velcro Close Bag
description:
Add to your play kitchen or grocery store with this interactive set of six felt food chocolate cookies with white filling with storage bag similar to those seen in stores! Bag features velcro closure as well as a fabric picture of a cookie and the word "cookies." The cookies are hand stitched. Set is life-sized.

Not intended for children under 3 or who are still mouthing their toys. Each item is crafted in a pet free, smoke free environment. Nontoxic glue was used in the making of the cookie bag, specifically to glue the letters to the bag. 


For international shipping options and to see more felt food, please see my etsy shop:   http://www.etsy.com/shop/FeltFoodKids

name: Felt Food Crackable Egg
description:
This design was inspired by my foodie four year old daughter who wanted eggs that could crack without making a mess on my kitchen floor! Egg is made from 100% wool using a wet-felting process. Edges are sewn with a blanket stitch to reduce tearing and to make the egg even cuter! The egg itself is about the size of a large egg and will fit in cardboard egg cartons. The egg inside is approximately 2 1/2 x 3 inches and made from eco felt. Egg inside is double layered for better durability and fits inside the egg shell.

Items are crafted individually so minor variability in size does occur. No glue is used in the making of this product. 

Not intended for children under 3 or who are still mouthing their toys. Each item is crafted in a pet free, smoke free environment.

For international shipping options and other felt food, please see my etsy shop:  www.etsy.com/FeltFoodKids

name: Felt Food Cheese Quesadilla with salsa and sour cream
description:
This listing is for one felt food cheese quesadilla, 1 salsa, and 1 sour cream. I love this adorable set! 

The quesadilla is approximately 6 1/2 inches in diameter when fully assembled. The salsa features prominent flecks of green pepper & is double layered for better durability. The sour cream puff is lightly stuffed.


Items are crafted individually so minor variability in size does occur. 

The set is sent in adorable packaging--perfect for gift giving!


Not intended for children under 3 or who are still mouthing their toys. Each item is crafted in a pet free, smoke free environment


See More Felt Food and international shipping options at my shop: http://www.etsy.com/shop/FeltFoodKids

name: Green Eggs and Ham Felt Food Set
description:
This listing is for 2 green eggs & 1 green ham slice. Inspired by one of my favorite stories to read to my daughter, Dr. Seuss' Green Eggs & Ham book. My daughter loves to have the pieces in hand while we read. 

What a great gift idea for preschool & elementary teachers or daycare providers! Pair up with a copy of the Dr. Seuss book for a great child's birthday or baby shower gift.

The ham slice is approximately 5 x 3 inches. The eggs are approximately 2 1/2 x 3 inches. They are perfect size for play kitchens & fit in well with my other felt food items. Items are crafted individually so minor variability in size does occur. No glue is used in the making of this product.



Not intended for children under 3 or who are still mouthing their toys. Each item is created in a pet free, smoke free environment.


For more listings of my felt food and international shipping options, please see my shop at:  http://www.etsy.com/shop/FeltFoodKids
